title: LFM for Plat+ dynamic Queue Team
body:
Hey Fams i am looking for Players from mid,support,adc and top for a dynamic queue team solely for climbing though plat all the way to Diamond and be on. the only requirement is not being toxic which include flaming,trolling and hateful words, Being Platinum 5 to Platinum 1, Has Teamspeak or skype and has a wide champion pool for the selected role.

We mainly play around Friday - Sunday all day 

I will only pick the people that add me first so if your interested hit me up before its to late

Cheers

replies.body: I can join but just dont be so reckless with jumping into things thats what made me leave
